name: bj-rabbid
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

comment: Version of ~ rabbidv with disjoint variable condition replaced by nonfreeness hypothesis. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)
